org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as

Class ScopedBlockNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.common.SourceLocation
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as.NodeBase
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as.TreeNode

            • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as.BlockNode
              • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.tree.as.ScopedBlockNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation, IASNode, IBlockNode, IContainerNode, IScopedNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileNode

    public class ScopedBlockNode
extends BlockNode
implements IScopedNode
    A BlockNode that is provided with a scope that collections definitions.

      • getAllImportNodes

        public void getAllImportNodes(Collection<IImportNode> importNodes)
        Description copied from interface: IScopedNode
        Returns all the imports that are relevant in the current scope. This will walk up the scope chain. If we are in a package context, this will avoid adding imports from the a File scope.
        Specified by:
        getAllImportNodes in interface IScopedNode
        Parameters:
        importNodes - an array of IImportNode representing all the imports

      • getAllImports

        public void getAllImports(Collection<String> imports)
        Description copied from interface: IScopedNode
        Returns all the imports that are relevant in the current scope. This will walk up the scope chain. If we are in a package context, this will avoid adding imports from the a File scope.
        Specified by:
        getAllImports in interface IScopedNode
        Parameters:
        imports - an array of Strings representing all the imports
